New Records: Liam Scales scored his first goal for the Republic of Ireland in this match.
Key Match Events: Finland took the lead in the 17th minute with a goal by Joel Pohjanpalo.
Ireland equalized in the 57th minute with a header by Liam Scales from a Robbie Brady free-kick.
Robbie Brady scored a late winner for Ireland in the 88th minute with a strike from outside the box.
Pre-Game Insights: Evan Ferguson returned to lead the line for Ireland.
Finn Azaz made his competitive debut for the Republic of Ireland.
Heimir Hallgrímsson made several changes to the starting lineup.
Post-Match Reflections: Ireland came from behind to secure a 2-1 victory, their first win under Heimir Hallgrímsson.
The match was noted for Ireland's resilience and key performances.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game had a late goal by Robbie Brady, which proved decisive.
The liveblog included details about the atmosphere, fan presence, and key moments.
